#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;
long long int map[205][5],num,freq,ansi[205],inde[205][205],ind,price[205][205],a[205][205],n,m,i,j,k,ans,mini;
char test[100],name[105][100];
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	scanf("%s",test);
	while(strcmp(test,"TheEnd"))
	{
	scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
	for(i = 1;i<=n;i++)
	{
	 scanf("%s",name[i]);
	 for(j = 1;j<=m;j++)
	 {
	 scanf("%lld",&price[j][i]);
	 
	 }
	 
	 }
	 
	 for(i = 1;i<=n;i++)
	   a[i][i] = price[1][i];
	   
	 for(j = 2;j<=m;j++)
	 {
	  for(i = 1;i<=n;i++)
	  {
	    for(k = 1;k<=n;k++)
	    {
	     if(k == i)
	     continue;
	     else
	     {
	     a[i][k] = a[i][i] - price[j][i] + price[j][k] + 100;
	  
	    
	    }
	    }
	   
	  
	  }
	  
	  for( i =1;i<=n;i++)
	  {
	  mini = a[1][i];
	  ind = 1;
	  for(k = 2;k<=n;k++)
	   {
	    if(mini>a[k][i])
	    {
	     mini = a[k][i];
	     ind = k;
	   
	   }
	   }
	   
	   a[i][i] = mini;
	   inde[j][i] = ind;
	  }
	 

	 }
	 
	 ans = a[1][1];
	 ind = 1;
	 for(i = 2;i<=n;i++)
	 {
	 if(ans>a[i][i])
	 {
	 ans = a[i][i];
	 ind = i;
	 }
	 }
	 
	 ansi[m] = ind;
	 for(j = m;j>=2;j--)
	 {
	  ansi[j-1] = inde[j][ind];
	  ind = ansi[j-1];
	 
	 }
	 
	num = ansi[1];
	freq = 1;
	i = 2;
	j=1;
	while(i<=m)
	{
	 if(ansi[i] == num)
	  freq++;
	else
	 {
	  map[j][1] = num;
	  map[j][2] = freq;
	 num = ansi[i];
	 freq = 1;
	 j++;
	 
	 }
	 i++;
	}
	
	map[j][1] = num;
	map[j][2] = freq;
	
	 printf("%s\n",test);
	printf("Tk %lld\n",ans);
	 
	 for(i = 1;i<=j;i++)
	 {
	  printf("%s for %lld month(s)\n",name[map[i][1]],map[i][2]);
	 }
	 printf("\n");
	scanf("%s",test);
	}
	printf("TheEnd\n");
	return 0;
}
